articles.title: Superbright 'Comet Lemmon' flies through auroras over Scotland during surprise solar storm - Live Science
articles.description: A photographer snapped a striking shot of Comet Lemmon streaking over Scotland as the night sky unexpectedly filled up with a technicolor mix of vibrant auroras.
articles.content:
